projects.name: atril
projects.partners: Oscar Ivarsson, Simon Bergström, Pär Eriksson, Jimmie Berg
projects.description: Written in C++ using OpenGL, GLFW and GLSL. Includes Object Loader, Shadow Mapping and Collision Detection

projects.name: MCTS poker agent
projects.description: Poker AI using Monte Carlo tree Search and opponent modelling.

projects.name: sumoke
projects.partners: Oscar Ivarsson, Simon Bergström, Pär Eriksson, Jimmie Berg
projects.description: A real time smoke simulation implemented with OpenGL and OpenCL. Volume Rendering made in GLSL. Pre-Simulation in MATLAB.

projects.name: jrforums
projects.description: First ever web-project a simple forum.

projects.name: mosaic
projects.description: The project is created in Matlab with the use of various techniques for performing image retrieval in large databases.The result is used for creating mosaic images, i.e. images that are made of multiple sub-images that are working as an assemblage of small mosaic pieces.

projects.name: donjoule
projects.description: Visualization over energy consumption in the world

projects.name: moa
projects.description: This course contained an extensive lab series related to different parts of modeling and animation. The labs were performed in C++ with an existing code structure. Lab 1: Mesh Data Structures, Lab 2: Mesh Decimation, Lab 3: Splines and Subdivision, Lab 4: Implicit Surfaces and Modeling, Lab 5: Level-Set Methods, Lab 6: Fluid Simulation

projects.name: volpix
projects.course: TSBK03 Technology For Advanced Computer Games
projects.partners: Oscar Ivarsson, Pär Eriksson, Jonas Görling
projects.description: This project is an implementation of a surface voxelization algorithm that runs in a single pass, completely on the GPU with the use of the hardware accelerated rasterization. Also a sparse voxel octree is implemented for the storage of the voxels at the CPU. The application is made for pure visualization of the voxels.

projects.name: Genetic tetris agent
projects.course: TNM066 Computer Models of Cognitive Processes
projects.description: Tetris AI optimized with the help of genetic algorithms.
